pages.text:
COB & PEN
1221 S. Florida Ave
Lakeland, FL 33803
We Are CRAFT.
Communal
C&P is a place to connect with people. We love the Lakeland community and want to be the first place you think of to have great drinks, food and conversation. Try sharing a specialty plate, a bottle of wine, or a large format beer with friends while you are here!
Recreational
C&P is a place to have fun. We have multiple ways that you can rest, relax and unwind. Whether you are playing cornhole on the lawn, or just laughing with your friends, we love creating a vibe that you can enjoy.
Accessible
While our food and drinks are unique and high quality, we want everyone to feel that our menu, prices, and atmosphere is accessible. We work hard to find a balance of classic food and drink you love with a C&P twist to it.
Friendly
We hope that every interaction you have here at C&P feels like you are among friends. Our team strives to treat every guest at our home with respect, kindness and professionalism. Hang out with friends or make a new one!
Team
Our team approach here at C&P means that we are all committed to making your drinks and dining experience incredible. We share tips, and you can ask anyone with a C&P shirt on for help (unless they don’t work here and are just wearing our merch!). If there is any way we can make your experience better, let someone from our team know!
HISTORY
A little over a mile from it’s current Dixieland location, The Tudor House was originally built in 1927 near the intersection between W Beacon Rd. and S San Gully Rd. In 1935, following one failed attempt, by a previous owner to move the home, Mr. O. Forrest McGill moved it to it’s previous location on 1068 Lake Hollingsworth Rd. The Tudor House changed hands over the next few decades until Mr. Gene Holloway bought it in 1969. Through the years, various owners and renovations, the house came to look quite different than it does today. Mr. Holloway expanded on the building too; adding a garage, more bedrooms, bathrooms, an entertainment bar, and ball room.
Read More Here.

Get in Touch

FAQ + Contact Us
Do you take reservations?
We operate on a first come, first serve basis. No need for reservations! If you are looking to book private space
click here.
If you are expecting a larger party but don’t want to book private space, please give us a call in advance to give a heads up.
How do the back rooms work?
As long as the rooms haven’t been booked for an event, they are also first come, first serve. Visit the bar whenever you need to order and we will bring your food back to you. Or request information for a private event
by clicking here.
Are children allowed?
Yes! Unfortunately we do not have high chairs or booster seats available, but you are more than welcome to bring your own in.
How do I book Cob & Pen for onsite/offsite catering or a private event?
Fill out our
event inquiry form
& our event coordinator will reach out to you
Where can we park?
In addition to street parking and our few spots out front, we have a gravel lot available on Belmar Ave that is completely free of charge.
When is brunch available?
We offer brunch on Saturdays & Sundays 11am-3pm and our regular menu begins at 3:30pm on those days.
Please direct any event related questions to cobandpenevents@gmail.com
Don’t see your question above or have feedback? Please email us at lakelandcobandpen@gmail.com - Thank you!

Our LOCATION
1221 S. Florida Ave
Lakeland, FL 33803

Scroll
PRIVATE EVENTS
Our beautifully designed spaces provide groups of different sizes several unique options. From indoor vintage motifs to outdoor settings with yard games, we have a spot for your group. Explore below to learn more.
UP TO 12 PEOPLE
THE Lounge
Book Now
DESCRIPTION
THIS ELOQUENTLY-DESIGNED ROOM IS A MIXTURE OF COMFORT AND CLASS WITH NATURAL LIGHT FLOWING THROUGHOUT THE SPACE. This room has a semi-private layout.
Seating
Lounge seating - up to 8 people
Casual events & mingling - up to 12 people
DETAILS
Price
: $75/2hrs
Includes a server
This room is semi-private
UP TO 20 people
Vintage DINING ROOM
Book Now
DESCRIPTION
The dining room is a Semi-private room that brings  ivy league and c.s. lewis vibes to South Florida Avenue. This space also includes a TV SCREEN & Sound system for Media presentations.
SEATING
Formal seating -  up to 20 people
Casual events & mingling
DETAILS
PRICE:
$150/2hrs
INCLUDES A SERVER
BUFFET STYLE SET UP available
SATELLITE BAR OPTION (Additional charge of $250)
UP TO 40 people
Vintage & Lounge COMBO
Book Now
DESCRIPTION
This option is a combination of the Vintage Dining Room and the lounge  to accommodate large groups or parties. If you want to maximize an indoor experience experience at Cob & Pen, this is a great option.
SEATING
up to 40 people if casual, drop-in
up to 25 people if formal seating
DETAILS
PRICE
: $500 for up to 6 hrs
Includes server
buffet style set-up available
satellite bar option available (additional charge of $250)
LAWN
Book Now
DESCRIPTION
our Beautiful lawn is a versatile space that can be used for any type of group or party event that wants to incorporate the outdoors. Our lawn is manicured and is nestled between S. Florida Avenue & W. Hancock st.
DETAILS
PRICE
: $500 for up to 6 hrs
Includes server
Buffet style set-up available
satellite bar option available (additional charge of $250)
seats 25-30 people
OUTDOOR PATIO
Book Now
DESCRIPTION
our patio is a versatile space that can be used for any type of group or event that wants to incorporate the outdoors.
DETAILS
PRICE
: $500 for up to 6 hrs
Includes server
Buffet style set-up available
satellite bar option available (additional charge of $250)
OTHER OPTIONS & COMBINATIONS
VINTAGE + Lounge + LAWN
$1,000 for up to 6 hours
Includes serving staff, banquet tables and chairs, private door with access from lawn to dining + lounge combo, buffet style set up, satellite bar option available, and lawn games (space and style of event pending).
Full RESTAURANT BUY OUT
$TBD
Based on day of the week, time, style of event, etc.
Includes serving staff, access to entire restaurant space, sound system for music, PA, big screen and projector use.  Seating varies.  We have been able to seat up to 100 people in round table type forum for company business meetings.
CATERING
With our 13CT license, we can cater food, beer, wine, and liquor (full bar) to your special event in the location of your choice. Pricing based on menu selections, travel distance, etc.
Catering Menu

Back to All Events
2nd Annual Galentine's Day Party
Thursday, February 13, 2020
4:00 PM
11:59 PM
16:00
23:59
Cob & Pen
1221 S Florida Avenue South
Lakeland, FL, 33803
United States
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
Join us for our 2nd annual Galentine’s Day Rose All Day Party!
$35 includes Rose All Day, Galentine’s Day t-shirt designed by Lakelander Chelsie Glass, & chocolate covered strawberries
$5 from every ticket goes to benefit Pace Center for Girls
This year we are featuring local, female owned businesses and will have vendors in house from 6-9pm and live music by Raney Wade from 8-11pm
Source::
https://www.facebook.com/events/3696347537074403/

We operate on a first come, first serve basis. No need for reservations! If you are looking to book private space
click here.
